You are expected to have expertise in GCP-specific tools and industry-standard DevOps and security practices.

This role includes working with CI/CD pipelines, securing cloud infrastructure, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to improve cloud adoption and operational excellence. You are expected to have expertise in GCP-specific tools and industry-standard DevOps and security practices.
